name: No Milk Chicken Sopas
description: Indulge in a heartwarming bowl of No Milk Chicken Sopas. Perfect for those looking for a high-protein and healthier twist on traditional recipes. This nourishing soup, part of our Healthyfied collection, is sure to satisfy your craving for comfort food.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the chicken legs and thighs under cold water and pat dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the cabbage and carrots, and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and add the chicken legs and thighs. Cook for about 25 minutes until the chicken is fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the chicken from the pot and shred it into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pot, saut√© the garlic and red onion until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced cabbage and carrots to the pot and cook until they are softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Return the shredded chicken to the pot and add the Calendula noodles. Cook until the noodles are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Season the soup to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
